function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased online shopping leading to empty retail spaces","Impact":"Economic decline in brick-and-mortar retail and increased vacancy in retail areas","Mitigation":"Revitalization of retail spaces for alternative uses such as experiences, green spaces, or housing","Technologies":"Online platforms, urban planning, adaptive reuse technologies","People":"Retail businesses, property owners, urban planners","Owner":"Urban planners, property owners, local government"},{"Description":"Obsolete parking spaces due to decreased demand","Impact":"Excess supply of parking spaces and wasted urban space","Mitigation":"Conversion of parking areas for alternative uses such as green spaces or housing","Technologies":"Urban planning, adaptive reuse technologies","People":"Urban planners, local government, property owners","Owner":"Urban planners, local government, property owners"},{"Description":"Changes in land use and zoning due to remote living and working","Impact":"Obsolete zoning and land use designations, need for more inclusive and flexible zoning","Mitigation":"Development of inclusive and flexible land use policies, adaptive zoning regulations","Technologies":"Urban planning, zoning software, remote work technologies","People":"Urban planners, local government, property owners","Owner":"Urban planners, local government, property owners"}]}
